lead_paragraph: Emanuel Burrowes, 17, admitted to assaulting the woman with two other boys who had escaped from a home for juvenile offenders in Brooklyn.

headline.main: Teenager Sentenced to 15 Years for Raping Woman in Chinatown

snippet: Emanuel Burrowes, 17, admitted to assaulting the woman with two other boys who had escaped from a home for juvenile offenders in Brooklyn.
abstract: Emanuel Burrowes, teenager who raped and robbed woman in Chinatown with two other boys, Eric Pek and Sanat Asliev, is sentenced to 15 years in prison; trio had escaped from group home for juvenile offenders run by Boys Town in Park Slope, Brooklyn, facility that has since been shut down.
